idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.2.0.700

descript.abstract: World Country Memberships of Political Organizations (table) represents the memberships of countries in world political organizations such as the Untied Nations, the International Monetary Fund (IMF), and the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).
descript.purpose: World Country Memberships of Political Organizations (table) provides world political organizations memberships by country. To display World Political Organization Membership attributes on a map, join this table to a World Countries attribute table using Fips_cntry or Cntry_name as the common field.

citeinfo.title: World Country Memberships of Political Organizations (table)

The data are provided by multiple, third party data vendors under license to ESRI for inclusion on ESRI Data & Maps for use with ESRI® software. Each data vendor has its own data licensing policies and may grant varying redistribution rights to end users. Please consult the redistribution rights below for this data set provided on ESRI Data & Maps. As used herein, “Geodata” shall mean any digital data set consisting of geographic data coordinates and associated attributes.
The redistribution rights for this data set: Public domain data from U.S. government is freely redistributable with proper metadata and source attribution.
The terms and conditions below apply to all the data sets provided on ESRI Data & Maps.

THE DATA AND RELATED MATERIALS ARE EXCLUDED FROM THE LIMITED WARRANTY, AND THE LICENSEE EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGES THAT THE DATA CONTAINS SOME NONCONFORMITIES, DEFECTS, OR ERRORS. cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States– Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local ESRI Regional Office. For support, you may contact Technical Support by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 909-793-3774; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com; ESRI holidays excluded.
Outside the United States– Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contactint.cfm.
For other questions or comments, you may contact ESRI headquarters by e-mail, telephone, or fax or write to us.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

enttyp.enttypd: The table represents the memberships of countries in world political organizations.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The FIPS code (two-letter) for the country.
attr.attrdefs: Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology

codesetd.codesets: National Institute of Standards and Technology

attr.attrdefs: CIA World Factbook, ESRI, Oxford Atlas of the World

attr.attrdef: The name of the capital city for the country.
attr.attrdefs: CIA World Factbook, ESRI, Oxford Atlas of the World

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the Food and Agriculture Organization.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: The year the country joined the United Nations General Assembly.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the International Atomic Energy Agency.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the International Monetary Fund.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the Education, Scientific, and Cultural Organization.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the World Health Organization.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

attr.attrdef: Indicates if the country is a member of the World Meteorological Organization.

edom.edomvd: The country is not a member.

digtinfo.formspec: The DBF file contains the attribute data in dBASE® format. The XML file (*.dbf.xml) contains the metadata describing the data set (optional).

stdorder.ordering: ESRI Data & Maps is available only as part of ESRI® software.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States, contact the ESRI Telesales staff at 800-447-9778 for more information about our software and data.
Outside the United States, please direct all inquiries to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contactint.cfm.

distinfo.techpreq: To use this data requires software that supports dBASE® files.

procstep.procdesc:
The following steps were performed by ESRI for Data & Maps 2002: Combined Serbia and Montenegro into Yugoslavia. Updated Fips_cntry attribute for East Timor and Yugoslavia.
The following steps were performed by ESRI: Extracted data set from the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency publication, The World Factbook 1992. Added attribute values from ArcWorld 1:3M and the Oxford Atlas of the World. Renamed attribute names. Removed attributes Abbrevname, Region, and Continent. Removed records for Soviet Union, Yugoslavia, and Czechoslovakia. Added new records from The World Factbook 2000 and other Geographic Reference materials. Updated Capital attribute values to match World Cities data set.

citeinfo.title: COUNTRIES, DEPENDENCIES, AREAS OF SPECIAL SOVEREIGNTY, AND THEIR PRINCIPAL ADMINISTRATIVE DIVISIONS
citeinfo.origin: Executive Secretary for Foreign Names - US Board on Geographic Names

citeinfo.title: COUNTRIES, DEPENDENCIES, AREAS OF SPECIAL SOVEREIGNTY, AND THEIR PRINCIPAL ADMINISTRATIVE DIVISIONS
citeinfo.origin: Executive Secretary for Foreign Names - US Board on Geographic Names

citeinfo.title: THE WORLD FACTBOOK 2002; 2003
citeinfo.othercit:
In general, information available as of 1 January 2002 was used in the preparation of The World Factbook 2002.
The Factbook has been an annual publication, but selected data and maps will be updated periodically during the coming year.

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by ESRI: Updated the membership information based on a review of The World Factbook. Renamed Yugoslavia to Serbia & Montenegro and updated the membership information. Changed GA_MEMB_YR field to "2002" for East Timor and Switzerland.
The following steps were performed by ESRI: Changed CNTRY_NAME attribute value from 'East Timor' to 'Timor Leste'. Removed the feature for Taiwan.

dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for number of records, attribute names, and values compared with source materials.

dataLineage.statement:
CIA Factbook - older (source 1 of 8)
United States Central Intelligence Agency, 20000101, 19920101, The World Factbook 2000, 1992: The World Factbook 2000, 1992, United States Central Intelligence Agency, Washington, DC, USA.
Source contribution: Attribute data
ArcWorld 1:3M (source 2 of 8)
ESRI, 19920801, ArcWorld™ 1:3M: ESRI, Redlands, California, USA.
Type of source media: CD–ROM Source scale denominator: 3000000 Source contribution: Attribute data
Oxford Atlas (source 3 of 8)
George Philip & Son, 1993, Oxford Atlas of the World: Oxford Atlas of the World 2nd edition, Oxford University Press, New York, New York, USA.
Type of source media: paper Source contribution: Attribute data
ESFN FIPS 10-4 20000225 (source 4 of 8)
Executive Secretary for Foreign Names - US Board on Geographic Names, 20000225, COUNTRIES, DEPENDENCIES, AREAS OF SPECIAL SOVEREIGNTY, AND THEIR PRINCIPAL ADMINISTRATIVE DIVISIONS: FIPS 10-4 , National Imagery and Mapping Agency, Bethesda, Maryland, USA.
Source contribution: Attribute data
ESFN FIPS 10-4 20010128 (source 5 of 8)
Executive Secretary for Foreign Names - US Board on Geographic Names, 20010128, COUNTRIES, DEPENDENCIES, AREAS OF SPECIAL SOVEREIGNTY, AND THEIR PRINCIPAL ADMINISTRATIVE DIVISIONS: FIPS 10-4 , National Imagery and Mapping Agency, Bethesda, Maryland, USA.
Source contribution: Attribute data
CIA Factbook (source 6 of 8)
United States Central Intelligence Agency, 20020101, 2003, THE WORLD FACTBOOK 2002; 2003: The World Factbook 2002; 2003, United States Central Intelligence Agency, Washington, DC, USA.
Online links: http://www.odci.gov/cia/publications/factbook/ http://www.cia.gov/cia/publications/factbook/index.html
Other citation details: In general, information available as of 1 January 2002 was used in the preparation of The World Factbook 2002. The Factbook has been an annual publication, but selected data and maps will be updated periodically during the coming year.
Type of source media: online Source contribution: Attribute data
http://news.bbc.co.uk (source 7 of 8)
BBC News, 20020314, Yugoslav partners sign historic deal: BBC News Online March 14, 2002, BBC News, online.
Online links: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/1872070.stm
Type of source media: online Source contribution: Attribute data
http://www.iso.ch (source 8 of 8)
International Organization for Standardization, 20021115, Updates on ISO 3166: International Organization for Standardization, online.
Online links: http://www.iso.ch/iso/en/prods-services/iso3166ma/03updates-on-iso-3166/nlv6e-tl.html
Other citation details: ISO 3166-1 NEWSLETTER No. V-6 [20021115]
Type of source media: online Source contribution: Attribute data
Date: 20020129 (change 1 of 3) The following steps were performed by ESRI for Data & Maps 2002: Combined Serbia and Montenegro into Yugoslavia. Updated Fips_cntry attribute for East Timor and Yugoslavia.
The following steps were performed by ESRI: Extracted data set from the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency publication, The World Factbook 1992. Added attribute values from ArcWorld 1:3M and the Oxford Atlas of the World. Renamed attribute names. Removed attributes Abbrevname, Region, and Continent. Removed records for Soviet Union, Yugoslavia, and Czechoslovakia. Added new records from The World Factbook 2000 and other Geographic Reference materials. Updated Capital attribute values to match World Cities data set.
Data sources used in this process: CIA Factbook - older ArcWorld 1:3M Oxford Atlas ESFN FIPS 10-4 20000225 ESFN FIPS 10-4 20010128
Date: 20020924 (change 2 of 3) The following steps were performed by ESRI: Updated the membership information based on a review of The World Factbook. Renamed Yugoslavia to Serbia & Montenegro and updated the membership information. Changed GA_MEMB_YR field to "2002" for East Timor and Switzerland.
Data sources used in this process: CIA Factbook http://news.bbc.co.uk
Date: 20040219 (change 3 of 3) The following steps were performed by ESRI: Changed CNTRY_NAME attribute value from 'East Timor' to 'Timor Leste'. Removed the feature for Taiwan.
Data sources used in this process: CIA Factbook http://www.iso.ch
